general_info.summary: This document lists various programs, schools, reports, initiatives, and key information related to Sharda University, including its academic offerings, administrative functions, student support services, and global presence. It covers areas such as dental sciences, medical research, nursing, examinations, student credits, feedback mechanisms, university brochures, leadership, history, statutory bodies, tenders, legal documents, COVID-19 updates, counseling services, skill enhancement, language and communication skills, entrepreneurship, innovation, FM radio, mentoring portals, recruiters, international programs, and ethical education.

additional_information.summary: This document appears to be a list of resources and information related to the SUAT 2025 examination, potentially for aspiring medical professionals. It includes references to sample papers, global knowledge seekers, recruiter information, banking and postal services, guidelines for visas and medical insurance, observership programs, and potential career paths at Lilavati Hospital & Research Centre and Meditrina Hospitals Private Limited, encouraging individuals to pursue a career in medicine.
